text: @HillaryClinton Over a third of the deaths were in nursing homes and the Democrat governors were the ones who put Covid19 patients into nursing homes and Pelosi was telling people to go to China town, Biden saying he wouldn’t have a travel ban cause Trump was xenophobic!!! You’re pathetic
